definitions.definition: Of high or especially quick cognitive capacity , bright .

examples: The engineer had a very intelligent design proposal for the new car.
The general devised an intelligent strategy for the southern campaign.
My girlfriend and I had an intelligent conversation.

definitions.definition: Having at least a similar level of brain power to humankind.
examples: The hunt for extraterrestrial intelligent life continues.

definitions.definition: Having an environment-sensing automatically-invoked built-in computer capability.

main_definition: Of high or especially quick cognitive capacity , bright .
secondary_definitions: Having at least a similar level of brain power to humankind.
( computing ) Having an environment-sensing automatically-invoked built-in computer capability.
